WebA

WebA Visualizer

WebA is designed to visualize data about poverty rates in the Philippines. By presenting data in an interactive and engaging way, we aim to increase awareness about the challenges faced by those living in poverty. With our easy-to-use interface and rich visualizations, you can explore data about poverty rates across different regions and demographic groups, gain insights into the factors that contribute to poverty in the Philippines.

Join us on this journey to create a better future for all Filipinos!
